data.title: KB932168 - MS07-020 - WindowsServer2003-SP2-KB932168-x86-ENU.exe - Windows Server 2003, Web Edition Updates
data.meta_description: Desktop Central is a Windows Desktop Management Software for managing desktops in LAN and across WAN from a central location. It provides Software Deployment, Patch Management, Asset Management, Remote Control, Configurations, System Tools, Active Directory and User Logon Reports. Its network-neutral architecture supports managing networks based on Active Directory, Novell eDirectory, and Windows Workgroups.

Windows Server 2003, Web Edition Patch Details

Patch Name WindowsServer2003-SP2-KB932168-x86-ENU.exe Patch Description Security Update for Windows Server 2003 (KB932168) Bulletin Id MS07-020 Bulletin Title Vulnerability in Microsoft Agent Could Allow Remote Code Execution (932168) Severity Moderate Location Path WindowsServer2003-SP2-KB932168-x86-ENU.exe Bulletin Summary This update resolves a newly discovered, privately reported vulnerability. Superceding Bulletin Id None Patch Release Date Apr 10, 2007
